text: The Essential Electric Light Orchestra is a 2003 greatest hits compilation album by British band Electric Light Orchestra. It has been re-released in 2008 and again in 2011 as 2-CD edition. ==Track listing== All tracks are written by Jeff Lynne, with the exception of Roll Over Beethoven by Chuck Berry === Original Edition === === 2011 Edition === === 2011 Edition === == References == Category:2003 albums Category:Electric Light Orchestra albums Category:Compilation albums
title: The Essential Electric Light Orchestra
